name: Swarm of Poisonous Snakes
description: A swarm composed of numerous tiny, venomous snakes that can move through small openings.
memorable: The swarm can incapacitate foes with its poisonous attacks and occupies the same space as its victims.
goals: To ambush and incapacitate prey using its poisonous nature.
relations: May be encountered with other serpentine creatures or in areas with dense foliage.
environment: Commonly found in jungles, swamps, or any warm environments where snakes thrive.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances evasiveness and allows effective ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and intelligence limit its direct combat effectiveness and strategic planning.
attacks: Bite attack dealing piercing damage and potential poison damage on a failed saving throw.
most_powerful_ability: The Poisonous Swarm ability that poisons creatures starting their turn in its space.
senses: Keen senses allow it to detect nearby creatures with enhanced awareness.
skills: Skilled in stealth, with a Stealth score of 14.
additional_information: Immunity to various conditions, making it difficult to control.
Resistant to most physical damage types.
Cannot regain hit points, making it vulnerable to concentrated attacks.
test_queries: venomous ambush predator in the jungle
quick moving swarm of snakes attacking
